description:
This component renders a `Dialog` when the `isOpen` prop is set to true.
It will manage the css transitions between the open and closed states.

isOpen.description: Boolean if the Dialog is currently open.

close.description:
A function to call that will close the dialog. This function will
be called when the overlay is clicked on simple dialogs.

children.description: Any children to display in the Dialog.

title.description: An optional title to display in the dialog.

actions.description:
A single action or a list of actions to display in the Dialog.
This can either be a list of `FlatButton` props or `FlatButton` elements.

actionLeft.description:
Any action to display to the left of the title in a full page dialog's toolbar.
See the [Toolbar's actionLeft](/components/toolbars) documentation for more information.

actionRight.description:
Any action to display to the right of the title in a full page dialog's toolbar.
See the [Toolbar actionsRight](/components/toolbars) documentation for more information.

className.description: An optional className to apply to the `Dialog` container.

dialogClassName.description: An optional className to apply to the `Dialog` itself.

contentClassName.description: An optional className to apply to the `Dialog`'s content section.

modal.description:
Boolean if the `Dialog` should behave as a modal. This means that one
of the actions must be selected to close the dialog. The overlay
can not be clicked to be closed.

style.description: An optional style to apply to the `Dialog` container.

dialogStyle.description: An optional style to apply to the `Dialog` itself.

contentStyle.description: An optional style to apply to the `Dialog`'s content section.

pageX.description:
An optional click/touch event's pageX location to use when
rendering a full page dialog. This will make the `Dialog` appear relative
to the click origin.

pageY.description:
An optional click/touch event's pageY location to use when
rendering a full page dialog. This will make the `Dialog` appear relative
to the click origin.

transitionName.description: The transition name to use for the `Dialog` when appearing/disappearing

transitionEnter.description: Boolean if the enter transition should be used.

transitionEnterTimeout.description: The timeout for the the enter transition.

transitionLeave.description: Boolean if the leave transition should be used.

transitionLeaveTimeout.description: The timeout for the leave transition.
